ValidationRule.description: Switching Sub-Type from "Risk Order Only" to "Risk Order With Risk Shippment"
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED (PSR_Pre_Sales_Risk_Opportunity_Sub_Type__c) , ISPICKVAL(PSR_Pre_Sales_Risk_Opportunity_Sub_Type__c, "Risk Order Only"), $Profile.Name <> $Label.Data_Loader_Profile_Name, ISPICKVAL(StageName, "In Execution"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot change the Pre-Sales Risk Opportunity Sub-Type from "Risk Order with Risk Shipment" into "Risk Order Only".
